Hi Ben,

Confirming we have updated the credit card surcharge for melbourne. Let me know if needed to update trades and syd.

Hi Joel,

1.8% Mastercard/Visa

4.5% for Amex

aalbiez@novaricollective.com do you want this changed for NSW as well? Our current rates on the proposal platform are not covering the stripe fees when clients pay directly through the proposal platform.

Kind Regards,

Ben Rookes
OPERATIONS MANAGER

0456 553 848 | brookes@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Ben,

I hope all is well.

We’re currently looking into this.

Could you please send us the Stripe fee percentages you’re being charged?
At the moment, the site is applying a surcharge fee of 1.7% for Visa/Mastercard and 3% for Amex.

Hi Ben,

Thanks for letting us know.

We'll look into this today and confirm.

Hi team,


Please see below. It seems we are having an issue when customers are paying via credit card directly through the proposal platform. Looks like we are not charging enough to cover credit card fees


Kind Regards,

Ben Rookes
OPERATIONS MANAGER

0456 553 848 | brookes@novaricollective.com

03 9580 4102 | Unit 74-76 Industrial Drive, Braeside VIC 3195

novaricollective.com.au






From: harmonia@crystaliam.com <harmonia@crystaliam.com>
Sent: Monday, April 28, 2025 11:55 AM
To: Ben Rookes <brookes@novaricollective.com>
Subject: stripe fees


Hello Ben


This issue with the fees was brought up last year around end september or so sometime. It was meant to be fixed by the proposal platform people. So there is still a shortfall and can be substantial as is for this particular proposal 9855. This now shows a shortfall of $150.91.

Invoice link: https://in.xero.com/MkHxXJCaOMv5LfjXOewQn0pMVa9dZHDC2UAxUvHy?utm_source=newInvoicingGetLinkButton


This is the link to test what the fee should be on a proposed amount -> https://www.feecalculator.io/stripe-fees-australia


Solution: Relocate the link to using stripe in xero, a couple options seem to have come through on new options in xero. With both of the options below they are paying directly via xero.


In Xero there is a new section - Business -> Payment Links = here you can create and send a payment link to the customer.


OR


Have no link to the stripe platform and the stylist to educate the customer and advise in the next day (after they accept the proposal) an invoice will be emailed to them.



Harmoniously

Renee Du Bois
